artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Mill: Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Twill weave variation, possibly on a Pomegranate warp. See Pomegranate, 99.1.1185. 3 orange warp. Brown, beige, white, metallic grey weft.Right selvedge. Lower edge machine stitched. Stapled inside 8.5x11" Mat folder. "H-8A" and "Pomegranite H.W" written on outside. Larsen card inside lists title as "Deer Cloth" (orange, white, brown, beige, metallic grey)
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc. %2F Deer Cloth%2C Jack Larsen%2C 1953
title: Deer Cloth
